leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 材料-实验合成与表征自动化生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 采集→计划→执行→记录→复现/审计
leaf_cluster.tool_form: LIMS/设备接口 + 闭环平台

tools.name: Python-IMU-Data-Sampling-App
tools.one_line_profile: Data acquisition tool for IMU motion tracking sensors
tools.detailed_description: A C-based tool designed for sampling and collecting data from Inertial Measurement Units (IMU) for motion tracking applications, facilitating physical data acquisition.

tools.name: sampledb-api-wrapper
tools.one_line_profile: Python client for SampleDB metadata database
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper for the HTTP API of SampleDB, enabling programmatic interaction with the web-based sample and measurement metadata database for scientific data management.

tools.name: LImBuS
tools.one_line_profile: Biobank Information Management System
tools.detailed_description: An open-source, standards-compliant Biobank Information Management System (LIMS) designed for managing biological samples and associated metadata in research environments.

tools.name: kedro-aim
tools.one_line_profile: Aim logging plugin for Kedro pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the Kedro framework that enables logging of machine learning experiments to the Aim experiment tracker, facilitating reproducibility and metric tracking in scientific ML workflows.

tools.name: bam-masterdata
tools.one_line_profile: Master data definitions for BAM Data Store
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing master data definitions and schemas for the BAM Data Store project, serving as a standard for materials science data structure and metadata.

tools.name: chatBIS
tools.one_line_profile: AI assistant for openBIS RDM system
tools.detailed_description: A conversational AI assistant using RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) to query documentation and provide answers about the openBIS research data management system.

tools.name: iskylims
tools.one_line_profile: LIMS for NGS and bioinformatics services
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS) specifically designed for Next Generation Sequencing (NGS) sample management, statistics, reporting, and bioinformatics analysis service management.

tools.name: Baobab LIMS
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source LIMS for biobanking
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS) tailored for biobanking, managing biospecimen lifecycles and associated metadata.

tools.name: Bika LIMS
tools.one_line_profile: Open source LIMS platform
tools.detailed_description: A free and open-source Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS) built on Plone, suitable for various laboratory disciplines to manage samples and analyses.

tools.name: CBSR-Biobank Web
tools.one_line_profile: Web interface for CBSR Biobank application
tools.detailed_description: The web application component of the CBSR Biobank system, providing a user interface for tracking and managing biospecimens in a biorepository.

tools.name: CBSR-Biobank Core
tools.one_line_profile: Biorepository application for tracking biospecimens
tools.detailed_description: The core application logic for the CBSR Biobank system, designed for tracking biospecimens and managing biorepository data.

tools.name: PymePix
tools.one_line_profile: Control and acquisition library for Timepix3-SPIDR
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing control and data acquisition capabilities for the Timepix3-SPIDR hardware, including data pipeline processing for mass spectroscopy and ion imaging.

tools.name: LISTER
tools.one_line_profile: Metadata extractor for eLabFTW experiments
tools.detailed_description: A workflow tool that extracts metadata from reusable, pre-annotated eLabFTW experiment entries to support FAIR research data management practices.

tools.name: Orca
tools.one_line_profile: Lab Automation Scheduling Software
tools.detailed_description: A software tool for scheduling and managing laboratory automation workflows and robotic systems.

tools.name: SciKGTeX
tools.one_line_profile: LaTeX package for semantic annotation of research contributions
tools.detailed_description: A LuaTeX package that allows researchers to mark scientific contributions in documents, embedding them as structured XMP metadata for Knowledge Graphs.

tools.name: gemd-python
tools.one_line_profile: Python binding for GEMD materials data model
tools.detailed_description: Python library for Citrine's GEMD (Graphical Expression of Materials Data) data model, enabling the representation of materials history, properties, and processes.

tools.name: Chemotion ELN
tools.one_line_profile: Open source Electronic Lab Notebook for chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A web-based Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN) tailored for chemistry, supporting the management of molecules, reactions, and analytical data.

tools.name: Chemotion Repository
tools.one_line_profile: Repository for chemical samples and research data
tools.detailed_description: A repository system designed to work with Chemotion ELN for storing and sharing samples, reactions, and related research data.

tools.name: senaite_addons
tools.one_line_profile: Add-ons for Senaite LIMS
tools.detailed_description: A collection of custom add-ons for the Senaite LIMS platform, extending its functionality for specific laboratory needs.

tools.name: sem-prov-ontologies
tools.one_line_profile: Ontologies for scientific observations and provenance
tools.detailed_description: A collection of ontologies focused on modeling scientific observations and the provenance of scientific workflows, supporting semantic data integration.

tools.name: sequenticon
tools.one_line_profile: DNA sequence identicon generator
tools.detailed_description: A Python library to generate visual identicons (fingerprints) for DNA sequences, aiding in quick visual verification and identification of genetic data.

tools.name: esse
tools.one_line_profile: JSON schemas for materials science data
tools.detailed_description: A collection of JSON schemas and examples representing structural data, properties, and modeling workflows to standardize materials science information.

tools.name: AreaA-data_modeling_and_schemas
tools.one_line_profile: ELN schemas for synthesis experiments
tools.detailed_description: Custom schemas for Electronic Lab Notebooks (ELN) specifically designed for materials synthesis experiments within the FAIRmat NFDI project.

tools.name: pyelabdata
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for eLabFTW data access
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that simplifies access to data stored in the eLabFTW Electronic Lab Notebook, facilitating data retrieval and integration into analysis workflows.

tools.name: Gogs (Research Data Management Fork)
tools.one_line_profile: Self-hosted Git service tailored for research data management and version control
tools.detailed_description: A fork of the Gogs self-hosted Git service, customized by G-Node to support research data management (RDM) workflows, enabling scientists to version control and manage datasets alongside code.

tools.name: GEMDAT
tools.one_line_profile: Python toolkit for molecular dynamics trajectory analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit designed for the analysis of molecular dynamics (MD) simulations, facilitating the processing and interpretation of simulation data for materials science.

tools.name: RDMP
tools.one_line_profile: Research Data Management Platform for loading, linking, and anonymizing datasets
tools.detailed_description: An open-source application designed for the loading, linking, anonymisation, and extraction of datasets stored in relational databases, supporting research data governance and privacy compliance.

tools.name: Sacred
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to configure, organize, log, and reproduce computational experiments
tools.detailed_description: A tool to help researchers configure, organize, log, and reproduce experiments. It provides a lightweight interface to manage experimental parameters and track results, ensuring reproducibility in scientific computing.

tools.name: BaseSpace Clarity LIMS Tools
tools.one_line_profile: API libraries and custom tools for BaseSpace Clarity LIMS integration
tools.detailed_description: A collection of API libraries, application examples, and custom tools designed to facilitate interaction with and extension of the BaseSpace Clarity Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS).

tools.name: LabelImgTool
tools.one_line_profile: Graphical image annotation tool for deep learning datasets
tools.detailed_description: A graphical image annotation tool written in C# capable of labeling various object types (rectangles, circles, ellipses, irregular shapes) for deep learning tasks like object detection and semantic segmentation.

tools.name: LIMS (Perl)
tools.one_line_profile: A Laboratory Information Management System implementation
tools.detailed_description: A standalone Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS) implemented in Perl, designed to manage laboratory samples, data, and workflows.

tools.name: Leaf LIMS
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source Laboratory Information Management System
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS) designed for flexibility and ease of deployment, allowing labs to track samples and experiments.

tools.name: CmdInterface
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight logging wrapper for command line and Python experiments
tools.detailed_description: A tool from DKFZ that enables detailed logging of command line and python experiments. It wraps function calls to log execution details, aiding in the reproducibility of scientific workflows.

tools.name: trixi
tools.one_line_profile: Modular experiment infrastructure for machine learning
tools.detailed_description: An experiment infrastructure optimized for PyTorch but framework-agnostic, designed to manage, log, and reproduce machine learning experiments in scientific research.

tools.name: pdf-renamer
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to rename scientific publication PDFs based on metadata
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool that automatically renames PDF files of scientific publications by looking up their metadata on the web, facilitating the organization of scientific literature.

tools.name: pdf2doi
tools.one_line_profile: Library to extract DOIs and metadata from scientific PDF files
tools.detailed_description: A Python library and command-line tool designed to extract the DOI or other identifiers from scientific paper PDF files, enabling automated metadata extraction for literature management.

tools.name: smilelogging
tools.one_line_profile: Python logging package for reproducible research experiments
tools.detailed_description: A Python logging package designed to facilitate easy and reproducible experimenting in research by managing logs, configurations, and experiment artifacts.

tools.name: nmrXiv
tools.one_line_profile: FAIR NMR data repository and computational platform
tools.detailed_description: A consensus-driven, FAIR (Findable, Accessible, Interoperable, Reusable) data repository and computational platform for Nuclear Magnetic Resonance (NMR) data management and analysis.

tools.name: PaperScraper
tools.one_line_profile: Web scraping tool for scientific paper text and metadata extraction
tools.detailed_description: A web scraping tool designed to systematically extract the text and corresponding metadata of scientific papers from university-accessible journals, aiding in text mining and literature review.

tools.name: Linear Inverse Modeling (LIM)
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for building linear inverse models for climate data
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts and tools from NOAA-PSL to build and analyze Linear Inverse Models (LIM), typically used for climate forecasting and diagnosing dynamics in geophysical data.

tools.name: DataFed
tools.one_line_profile: Federated scientific data management system for distributed repositories
tools.detailed_description: A federated scientific data management system designed to organize, search, and access data across distributed scientific facilities and repositories.

tools.name: OLiMS
tools.one_line_profile: Open source LIMS module for Odoo ERP
tools.detailed_description: A Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS) implemented as a module for the Odoo ERP platform, facilitating lab workflow and data management.

tools.name: OpenSILEX
tools.one_line_profile: Information system for scientific research data management
tools.detailed_description: An open-source information system designed for the management of scientific research data, particularly in environmental and life sciences.

tools.name: Chlorophyll-a-Prediction
tools.one_line_profile: AI model for predicting ocean chlorophyll-a concentration
tools.detailed_description: An AI-driven project for predicting chlorophyll-a concentration and ocean productivity using remote sensing data and machine learning.

tools.name: gemdata
tools.one_line_profile: Database system for Global Ecosystem Monitoring (GEM)
tools.detailed_description: The database code, importers, and frontend for the Global Ecosystem Monitoring (GEM) network, managing ecological data.

tools.name: PASTA-ELN
tools.one_line_profile: Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN) for research data
tools.detailed_description: An Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN) system designed to manage research data and notes, featuring a new frontend interface.

tools.name: ACR-RSNA-CDEs
tools.one_line_profile: Common Data Elements (CDEs) schema for radiology
tools.detailed_description: JSON schema and materials for creating common data elements (CDEs) in radiology, facilitating standardized data reporting.

tools.name: SimpleELN
tools.one_line_profile: Secure electronic lab notebook for scientific data
tools.detailed_description: An electronic lab notebook (ELN) designed to facilitate the secure organization, storage, search, and sharing of scientific data and research notes.

tools.name: TheELNFileFormat
tools.one_line_profile: Specification for the ELN file format
tools.detailed_description: A specification defining the .eln file format for interoperable electronic lab notebook data exchange.

tools.name: any2eln
tools.one_line_profile: Converter tool for creating .eln archives
tools.detailed_description: A utility tool to convert various data inputs into the standard .eln archive format for electronic lab notebooks.

tools.name: GEMDeCan
tools.one_line_profile: Gene expression and methylation deconvolution for cancer
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics tool for deconvolution of cancer samples using gene expression and methylation data.

tools.name: Kairos
tools.one_line_profile: Scientific conference metadata crawler and extractor
tools.detailed_description: A tool combining a crawler and information extraction engine to harvest and index metadata from scientific conference websites.

tools.name: VideoSemanticLabeler
tools.one_line_profile: Semantic labeling tool for UAV video datasets
tools.detailed_description: A video semantic labeling tool specifically designed for the UAVid dataset, facilitating data preparation for remote sensing and urban analysis.

tools.name: Phoenix-ELN
tools.one_line_profile: Electronic lab notebook for organic chemistry
tools.detailed_description: An electronic lab notebook (ELN) specifically designed for organic chemistry workflows and data management.

tools.name: automancer
tools.one_line_profile: Experiment design and automation management tool
tools.detailed_description: A software application that enables researchers to design, automate, and manage their scientific experiments.

tools.name: OpenLabFramework
tools.one_line_profile: Open source framework for research data management in biological labs
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed to facilitate research data management, specifically tailored for biological contexts (implied by 'daisybio'), enabling structured data handling and lab workflows.

tools.name: elabftwqrprint
tools.one_line_profile: QR code generator for eLabFTW database entries
tools.detailed_description: A utility tool to generate and print QR code stickers for entries in the eLabFTW electronic lab notebook, facilitating physical sample tracking and linking to digital records.

tools.name: liminal-orm
tools.one_line_profile: ORM toolkit for Benchling schema management
tools.detailed_description: An Object-Relational Mapping (ORM) toolkit designed to synchronize Benchling (a popular life science R&D cloud platform) schemas with downstream dependencies, aiding in data modeling and management.

tools.name: elabapi-python
tools.one_line_profile: Python client library for eLabFTW API
tools.detailed_description: The official Python library for interacting with the eLabFTW Electronic Lab Notebook API, enabling automation of lab notebook entries, data retrieval, and integration with other scientific workflows.

tools.name: elabapy
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for eLabFTW API
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that provides an interface to interact with the eLabFTW API, allowing researchers to programmatically manage their electronic lab notebook data.

tools.name: elabctl
tools.one_line_profile: Management CLI for eLabFTW installations
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool for managing eLabFTW installations, including tasks such as installation, backups, and updates, ensuring the reliability of the electronic lab notebook infrastructure.

tools.name: eLabFTW
tools.one_line_profile: Open source electronic lab notebook for research labs
tools.detailed_description: A widely used open-source Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN) designed for research laboratories to track experiments, manage inventory, and collaborate on research data securely.

tools.name: Indigo ELN
tools.one_line_profile: Open source chemistry electronic lab notebook
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN) specifically designed for chemistry research, supporting chemical structure rendering, reaction tracking, and experiment management.

tools.name: scientific-data-viewer
tools.one_line_profile: VSCode extension for exploring scientific data metadata
tools.detailed_description: A Visual Studio Code extension that allows researchers to explore the metadata and structure of common scientific data file formats (like HDF5, NetCDF) directly within the editor.

tools.name: maggot
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight tracker for numerical experiments
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight Python library designed to help researchers track configuration, results, and artifacts of numerical experiments, facilitating reproducibility in computational science.

tools.name: hiplot-mlflow
tools.one_line_profile: HiPlot visualizer for MLflow experiments
tools.detailed_description: A tool that integrates HiPlot (high-dimensional plotting) with MLflow, allowing researchers to visualize and analyze high-dimensional experiment parameters and metrics logged in MLflow.

tools.name: obsidian-eln
tools.one_line_profile: Electronic Lab Notebook based on Obsidian
tools.detailed_description: A configuration/vault setup that transforms the Obsidian markdown editor into an Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN), leveraging Obsidian's linking and plugin capabilities for research documentation.

tools.name: obsidian-eln-plugin
tools.one_line_profile: Obsidian plugin for ELN functionality
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for Obsidian that adds specific features for Electronic Lab Notebook usage, such as experiment templates or metadata handling, enhancing Obsidian for scientific workflows.

tools.name: labtablet
tools.one_line_profile: Electronic Laboratory Notebook for Android
tools.detailed_description: An Electronic Laboratory Notebook (ELN) application designed for Android tablets, allowing researchers to record experiments and data directly at the bench.

tools.name: gnosis-track
tools.one_line_profile: Logging machine for AI experiments
tools.detailed_description: An open-source logging tool designed to track and manage AI experiments, facilitating the recording of hyperparameters, metrics, and results in research projects.

tools.name: grit
tools.one_line_profile: Preclinical drug discovery data management platform
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive research data management platform for storing, managing, and visualizing data across all phases of preclinical drug discovery.

tools.name: ClinViro
tools.one_line_profile: LIMS specifically designed for HIV genotypic resistance testing laboratories
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS) tailored for managing HIV genotypic resistance tests, supporting data tracking and laboratory workflows in clinical virology.

tools.name: teemi
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for reproducible microbial strain construction and DBTL cycle simulation
tools.detailed_description: A platform for automating the Design-Build-Test-Learn (DBTL) cycle in metabolic engineering. It includes features for generating genetic parts, designing libraries, tracking samples (LIMS-like functionality), and ensuring FAIR data principles.

tools.name: EO4VisTrails
tools.one_line_profile: VisTrails plugin for Earth Observation data access and processing
tools.detailed_description: An extension for the VisTrails scientific workflow management system that adds capabilities for accessing, pre-processing, and analyzing spatial and temporal Earth Observation (EO) data.

tools.name: InvenioRDM
tools.one_line_profile: Turn-key research data management platform
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive platform for research data management (RDM), enabling researchers to archive, preserve, and share scientific data. It serves as a repository system often integrated with LIMS/ELN ecosystems.

tools.name: trigger_handler
tools.one_line_profile: Utility for sending hardware triggers from browser-based neuroscience experiments
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed for psychology and neuroscience laboratories to send synchronization triggers (via parallel port) from browser-based experiments to external hardware like eye-trackers or EEG systems.

tools.name: Metadata Schemas for Materials Science
tools.one_line_profile: Metadata schemas for describing measurement techniques in materials science
tools.detailed_description: A collection of metadata schemas developed by KIT Data Manager to standardize the description of measurement techniques and data in materials science, facilitating FAIR data practices.

tools.name: Lamindb
tools.one_line_profile: Data framework for biology integrating lakehouse, lineage, and ELN features
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based data framework designed for biology that unifies data management (lakehouse), data lineage tracking, and laboratory information management (LIMS/ELN). It makes biological data queryable, traceable, and reproducible.

tools.name: bein
tools.one_line_profile: Miniature LIMS and workflow manager for bioinformatics
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS) and workflow manager designed specifically for bioinformatics research, facilitating the tracking of data and analysis steps.

tools.name: scythe
tools.one_line_profile: Metadata extraction library for scientific files
tools.detailed_description: An extensible library of tools developed by the Materials Data Facility to extract metadata from various scientific file formats, facilitating data indexing and discovery.

tools.name: kora
tools.one_line_profile: Digital repository application for complex multimedia objects
tools.detailed_description: A database-driven digital repository application designed to store, manage, and deliver digital objects with corresponding metadata, enhancing research and educational value.

tools.name: Parkour2
tools.one_line_profile: Laboratory Information Management System for sequencing facilities
tools.detailed_description: A Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS) developed by the Max Planck Institute, designed to manage requests and workflows in sequencing facilities.

tools.name: django-lab-inventory
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based lab inventory management system
tools.detailed_description: A Django-based application for managing laboratory inventory, allowing researchers to track chemicals, equipment, and other lab resources.

tools.name: MISO
tools.one_line_profile: LIMS for NGS sequencing centres
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS) specifically designed for Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) centres to track samples and sequencing runs.

tools.name: Open-LIMS
tools.one_line_profile: Open-Source Laboratory Information Management System
tools.detailed_description: A general-purpose, open-source Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS) for managing projects, subjects, and samples in scientific laboratories.

tools.name: Sumatra
tools.one_line_profile: Automated electronic lab notebook for computational projects
tools.detailed_description: A tool for managing and tracking numerical simulation and analysis projects, acting as an automated electronic lab notebook (ELN) to support reproducible research.

tools.name: openPMD-api
tools.one_line_profile: API for Scientific I/O with openPMD standard
tools.detailed_description: A C++ and Python library for reading and writing scientific data according to the openPMD (Particle Mesh Data) standard, facilitating data exchange in physics simulations.

tools.name: PeakLims
tools.one_line_profile: Source-available Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS)
tools.detailed_description: A LIMS solution designed to manage laboratory samples, workflows, and data, offering a fair-code licensed platform for lab automation.

tools.name: codemetapy
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for generating and working with CodeMeta metadata
tools.detailed_description: A library to generate, validate, and manipulate CodeMeta metadata for scientific software, facilitating software citation and preservation.

tools.name: SciFiReaders
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for extracting data and metadata from scientific data files
tools.detailed_description: A library for reading and extracting metadata from various scientific file formats, particularly in microscopy and materials science, developed by the Pycroscopy ecosystem.

tools.name: PyRDM
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for research data management automation
tools.detailed_description: A library to facilitate the automated publication of scientific software and associated input/output data to repositories like Figshare or Zenodo.

tools.name: Pyradigm
tools.one_line_profile: Data structure for medical imaging and machine learning datasets
tools.detailed_description: A Python class and format to handle dataset management in biomedical and machine learning applications, ensuring metadata and features are kept together.

tools.name: pygriffinlim
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of the Griffin-Lim algorithm for audio reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing the Griffin-Lim algorithm to reconstruct audio signals from magnitude spectrograms, useful in signal processing research.

tools.name: RDMO
tools.one_line_profile: Research Data Management Organiser
tools.detailed_description: A tool to support the planning, implementation, and organization of research data management, allowing institutions to provide structured questionnaires for data management plans.

tools.name: smarter-labelme
tools.one_line_profile: Enhanced image and video annotation tool
tools.detailed_description: A fork of LabelMe with added features for video and image annotation, including polygon, semantic mask, and classification support, useful for preparing scientific image data.

tools.name: vrp-benchmarks
tools.one_line_profile: Solution checker and generator for VRP benchmarks
tools.detailed_description: A toolset for checking solutions and generating tables for Vehicle Routing Problem (VRP) benchmarks, supporting operations research.

tools.name: UniversaLIS
tools.one_line_profile: Laboratory Information System for clinical analyzers
tools.detailed_description: A LIMS designed for ASTM/CLSI-compliant clinical laboratory analyzers, supporting serial and TCP connections for instrument data acquisition.

tools.name: noggin
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight experiment logging and plotting tool
tools.detailed_description: A simple Python tool for logging and plotting measurements in real-time during machine learning experiments.

tools.name: RSpace Client Python
tools.one_line_profile: Python SDK for RSpace ELN API
tools.detailed_description: Official Python client for interacting with the RSpace Electronic Lab Notebook API, enabling programmatic access to lab data and notebooks.

tools.name: Rucio
tools.one_line_profile: Scientific Data Management system
tools.detailed_description: A scalable software framework for managing large amounts of scientific data, originally developed for ATLAS at CERN, now used for various scientific disciplines.

tools.name: open_enventory
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical inventory and Electronic Lab Notebook
tools.detailed_description: A web-based chemical inventory and ELN system designed for chemistry labs, featuring structure search and inventory tracking.

tools.name: Sequencescape
tools.one_line_profile: LIMS for high-throughput sequencing
tools.detailed_description: A Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS) developed by the Sanger Institute for tracking samples and workflows in high-throughput sequencing.

tools.name: SampleDB
tools.one_line_profile: Sample and Measurement Metadata Database
tools.detailed_description: A web-based electronic lab notebook and metadata database for managing samples and measurements in scientific experiments.

tools.name: SciNote
tools.one_line_profile: Open Source Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN)
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive ELN for managing laboratory work, organizing projects, and storing experimental data, with inventory and workflow management features.

tools.name: SENAITE
tools.one_line_profile: Enterprise Open Source Laboratory Information Management System
tools.detailed_description: A robust, web-based LIMS built on Plone, designed for enterprise laboratory environments to manage samples, analyses, and reports.

tools.name: SENAITE Impress
tools.one_line_profile: HTML to PDF rendering engine add-on for SENAITE LIMS
tools.detailed_description: An add-on for the SENAITE Laboratory Information Management System that provides an engine to render HTML reports into PDF format, facilitating the generation of laboratory reports.

tools.name: SENAITE JSON API
tools.one_line_profile: RESTful JSON API for SENAITE LIMS data access
tools.detailed_description: A core component of the SENAITE LIMS ecosystem that provides a RESTful JSON API, enabling external applications and instruments to interact with the laboratory information system for data exchange and automation.

tools.name: SENAITE LIMS
tools.one_line_profile: Open source Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS)
tools.detailed_description: The core meta-package for SENAITE, an open-source LIMS built on Plone, designed for managing laboratory samples, analyses, and workflows in clinical and industrial environments.

tools.name: SENAITE Patient
tools.one_line_profile: Patient management module for SENAITE LIMS
tools.detailed_description: An extension for SENAITE LIMS that adds capabilities for handling patient data, specifically tailored for clinical laboratory environments to link samples with patient records.

tools.name: SENAITE Storage
tools.one_line_profile: Sample storage management add-on for SENAITE LIMS
tools.detailed_description: A module for SENAITE LIMS that manages the physical storage locations of laboratory samples, allowing users to track sample positions within freezers, shelves, and boxes.

tools.name: Terracotta
tools.one_line_profile: Experimental platform for randomized controlled trials in education
tools.detailed_description: A plug-in for learning management systems (LMS) that facilitates rigorous education research by enabling randomized controlled trials (RCTs) within online assignments, handling consent, treatment variations, and privacy protection.

tools.name: Iterate
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking and hyper-parameter optimization tool for ML experiments
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed for benchmarking and hyper-parameter optimization in machine learning experiments, leveraging MLFlow for logging, Optuna for optimization, and Ray for parallelization, facilitating systematic ML research.

tools.name: HDF5View
tools.one_line_profile: Visualizer for HDF5 scientific data files
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight Qt/Python-based viewer for HDF5 files, allowing researchers to inspect, explore, and visualize hierarchical scientific data structures without writing code.

tools.name: TorchFL
tools.one_line_profile: Federated learning library based on PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for rapid prototyping, experimenting, and logging of federated learning algorithms, built on top of PyTorch and PyTorch Lightning, facilitating research in distributed machine learning.

tools.name: tranSMART
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge management platform for translational medicine
tools.detailed_description: An open-source knowledge management platform that enables scientists to develop and refine research hypotheses by investigating correlations between genetic and phenotypic data in translational medicine research.

tools.name: NIST AFL Automation
tools.one_line_profile: Automation software for NIST Autonomous Formulation Lab
tools.detailed_description: The backend automation software powering the NIST Autonomous Formulation Lab (AFL), providing device integration, drivers, and orchestration for autonomous materials formulation experiments.

tools.name: NEMO
tools.one_line_profile: Laboratory logistics and resource management application
tools.detailed_description: A web application developed by NIST for laboratory logistics, enabling scheduling of reservations, controlling tool access, and tracking maintenance issues for shared laboratory resources.

tools.name: NexusLIMS
tools.one_line_profile: LIMS for microscopy facility management
tools.detailed_description: A Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS) designed specifically for the Nexus Microscopy Facility at NIST, handling metadata and workflow management for microscopy experiments.

tools.name: Hermes
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible materials modeling and lab automation tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python package from NIST for flexible materials modeling and laboratory automation, facilitating the integration of simulation and experimental workflows.

tools.name: Label-Pixels
tools.one_line_profile: Semantic segmentation tool for remote sensing imagery
tools.detailed_description: A tool for semantic segmentation of remote sensing images using Fully Convolutional Networks, originally designed for road network extraction but extensible to other features.

tools.name: Scientific Filesystem (SCIF)
tools.one_line_profile: Filesystem organization standard and tool for scientific software
tools.detailed_description: A tool and standard for organizing scientific software and metadata within filesystems and containers to enhance reproducibility, discoverability, and modularity of scientific applications.

tools.name: notedeln
tools.one_line_profile: Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN) for documenting scientific experiments
tools.detailed_description: A C++ based Electronic Lab Notebook designed for researchers to record, manage, and store experimental data and notes digitally, replacing traditional paper notebooks.

tools.name: test-tube
tools.one_line_profile: Library for logging experiments and parallelizing hyperparameter search
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to facilitate the logging of machine learning experiments and the parallelization of hyperparameter optimization, particularly useful for managing scientific computational experiments.

tools.name: label-fusion
tools.one_line_profile: Volumetric fusion tool for semantic labels and masks
tools.detailed_description: A tool for fusing multiple semantic labels and masks into a volumetric 3D reconstruction, useful for generating 3D ground truth data from 2D annotations in robotics and computer vision research.

tools.name: xlinkBook
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based research management tool for big data
tools.detailed_description: A web-based platform designed for managing research activities and handling big data, serving as a tool for scientific collaboration and data organization.

tools.name: RGBD-Slam-Semantic-Seg-DeepLab
tools.one_line_profile: Integration of SLAM with DeepLab-V2-CRF for semantic mapping
tools.detailed_description: A package that combines common SLAM (Simultaneous Localization and Mapping) techniques with the DeepLab-V2-CRF library to perform RGB-D semantic segmentation and mapping, applicable in robotics and spatial characterization.

tools.name: labelme2dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for Labelme annotations to COCO or Cityscapes formats
tools.detailed_description: A utility tool to convert semantic segmentation datasets annotated with Labelme into standard formats like COCO or Cityscapes, facilitating data preparation for scientific image analysis models.
